title: Conformally Exact Black Hole Perturbed by a Marginal Operator
abstract: We have examined effective theory induced by gauged WZW models, in which the tachyon field is added as a marginal operator. Due to this operator added, we must further add the higher order corrections, which modifies the original configuration, to make the theory full-conformally invariant. It has been found that 2d is a critical dimension in the sense that the metric obtained from gauged WZW is modified by the tachyon condensation for $d>2$, but not for $d\le 2$.
